input.sentences: we went to the park to do an easter egg hunt .
this was the basket we designed for the eggs
then | all the kids ran looking for the eggs .
after we were done . we grabbed hands and started to sing songs .
then we all played at the park .
output.sentences: The kids and their parents arranged for an easter egg hunt in the park.
The kids had designed special baskets to carry the eggs that they found in.
When the hunt started, the kids ran around looking for any eggs they could find.
Someone got excited and started a song and then everyone started to sing.
After the eggs were all found, the kids played in the park the rest of the day.
